title: Lp loss while in Series before it is complete
body: Ok, so the other day i qualified for my series and for bronze 1 I decided that i wanted to play top lane beacause jg was gettting boring I get into the game do pretty bad then say ok, i just have to win the next two i look into my profile and see i lose 16 lp, I then think that i may have dodged a game and already lost my series. So i play another game slightly tilted at this i lose that game then i get the "you have not qualified for a promotion / series failed" message and i lose another 23 lp. I understand for losing a series you lose lp at the end but why did I lose lp during it?

replies.body: Even while in a series, you gain and lose LP.  You can stay at 100 as you win a series but losing a match can take some LP away like any ranked game.  I did look at your case to see what happened, and it looks like you had a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  Dodging during your series will result in a loss as well as a loss of LP.  It's a bummer that happened, but hopefully that helps clear things up.  Good luck on your next promos!
